title: Snow Shapes
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Snow Shapes! 

This package contains 10 Snow Shapes sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/Yw7i2k8hm3E


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


●Snow Shape Element 01_2048 × 1728

●Snow Shape Element 02_3072 × 2016

●Snow Shape Element 03_2560 × 1728

●Snow Shape Element 04_2048 × 1728

●Snow Shape Element 05_2560 × 1728

●Snow Shape Element 06_2560 × 1440

●Snow Shape Element 07_2048 × 1440

●Snow Shape Element 08_2048 × 1728

●Snow Shape Element 09_2048 × 1728

●Snow Shape Element 10_2048 × 1440


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
